data.eml:eml: Revision of the genus Coeliccia Kirby in Borneo part II: Two new species from the membranipes- group, with a redescription of C. macrostigma Laidlaw (Odonata: Zygoptera: Platycnemididae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Dow, Rory A. (2016): Revision of the genus Coeliccia Kirby in Borneo part II: Two new species from the membranipes- group, with a redescription of C. macrostigma Laidlaw (Odonata: Zygoptera: Platycnemididae). Zootaxa 4184 (1): 79-103, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4184.1.5
